content:
Brady earned $400$ stars in his school's Read-a-Thon event last year.  His goal for this year is to earn at least $100$ more stars than he did last year. He earns $50$ stars for each book he reads and $5$ stars for each magazine he reads.

**Write an *inequality* that represents the number of books $(B)$ and magazines $(M)$ Brady must read to meet his goal.**

[[☃ expression 1]]

**Graph the constraint equation with $B$ on the horizontal axis and $M$ on the vertical axis.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

**If Brady reads $6$ books $(B)$, which of the following numbers of magazines $(M)$ can he read to meet or exceed the star goal?** 

[[☃ radio 1]]
